Fearless Wallet Browser Extension is designed for the decentralized future on the Kusama and Polkadot networks, optimized for Chrome and Chrome based browsers. Fearless Wallet provides the best user experience, fast performance, and secure storage for your accounts.

Fearless Wallet is a Non-Custodial, Decentralized and Open-Source Web application for the Polkadot and Kusama ecosystems with the best UX, performance, and, most importantly, security.

Multi-asset/network support. Users own their tokens, Fearless Wallet takes 0 additional fees, staking rewards are set by the networks.

Hyper fast

Fearless Wallet‚Äòs blazing fast performance outpaces other apps in the ecosystem.

Simply complete

Fearless Wallet‚Äòs awesome UI enables any user (even newbies) to perform actions in 1-2 taps, while advanced users still retain access to all of the key features available on the network. Experience ease of staking with only 3 taps.

The goal of Fearless Wallet is to radically expand access to decentralised finance (DeFi) by making complex functions much easier to use and understand.

Network Management

Fearless Wallet offers users a convenient way to manage multiple accounts within a single app.
Since Fearless Wallet is a non-custodial application, all accounts are stored securely on the blockchain, while on-device data is stored within a private space on the user's device.
Account names can be modified, accounts can be rearranged or removed, and accounts can be exported in JSON format.

In addition to standard account management functions, Fearless Wallet enables in-app network management.

Users can view lists of default Kusama, Polkadot, and Westend connections (Parity and W3F nodes) as long as a great deal of parachain nodes; add, update, rearrange, and remove custom nodes, and easily switch between accounts, networks, and nodes.

Fast and intuitive transfers

Send and receive tokens via account address or QR code.

Handling keys by a Google account

Our goal is to make users' wallet management experience as smooth and simple as possible.  We have added the opportunity to create a wallet and store secret keys on your Google Account as long as you have the ability to import them from Google as a part of the ‚ÄúImport flow‚Äù.

Cross-chain transfers

The App supports up-to-date and high-tech functionality such as XCM cross-chain teleports. It allows users to move their assets between relay chains and/or parachains.

dApp operations

Due to the Beacon SDK and a special logic integrated, the App can give users an access to the vast number of dApps. Moreover dApp transactions can be signed either by the Web application itself or by the Mobile version of the Wallet as external signer which in fact is a more secure way of operating with dApps.

Token fiat rates and total balance fiat equivalents in USD and other currencies can also be viewed within the application using the Coingecko REST API.
